title: End of Year Listener Mail Bag
description:
In this episode, Kara and Scott dedicate a full show to the questions you've sent in! They answer questions on responsible gambling, the future of transportation, green energy investments, and more. They also reveal their favorite interviews over the past year, as well as their New Year's resolutions for 2022.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
